instruction: Suggest some tips for writing an essay.
output: 1. Brainstorm and come up with an interesting topic.  2. Research and gather evidence to support your ideas. 3. Carefully plan and organize your essay. 4. Keep a consistent flow of ideas throughout the essay. 5. Go through a few drafts so that you can improve your writing and structure. 6. Check for errors and make sure your essay is error-free. 7. Take the time to proofread your essay and make sure it's flawless.
